rooms.description: Open-plan living and kitchen space with natural light and eco-friendly materials.
Compact studio bathroom with water-saving fixtures and natural ventilation.
Small storage area integrated into the living area to maximize space efficiency.

openings.description: Main entrance following Vastu principles with east-west orientation.
Window opening to an adjacent patio for ventilation and natural light.

external_spaces.description: Eco-friendly garden space designed with native plants and a water feature.

rooms.description: Master bedroom designed with soundproof walls and ample natural light.
Balcony providing views and fresh air, integrated with the bedroom.

openings.description: Staircase connecting ground and upper floors, designed for accessibility.
Window providing cross-ventilation in the bedroom area.
